name: One way to wings
description:
Its a short adventure game. It's a hard game. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please look at the controls, it is very important:

WASD - move;

There are 3 player stances in the game:

q - idle, to restore stamina.

e - to attack (LMB)

r - for protection, it makes you invulnerable. Without this, the game is unplayable.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you can't go to the next level, then to go to the next level, just go right. Even if nothing happens, then press TAB to load the save, perhaps this was due to the fact that you killed a lot of mice at once

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game created by:

Lorsa - programmer

XarandiiFox - artist

Alex Moro - musician

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

and all! Enjoy the game!
